title: Mars Rover Landing CRASH COURSE- 3 DAYS LEFT!
author: Mark Rober
description:
This will be cooler than the Super Bowl. Thanks to Bill and Melinda Gates for partnering with me on this video. Read the 2021 Annual Letter, here: http://gatesnot.es/3cfnMF6

Watch the live stream- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gm0b_ijaYMQ&ab_channel=NASA
Main rover landing page- https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/
Cool rover interactive animation of the 7 mins of terror- https://eyes.nasa.gov/apps/mars2020/#/home?id=surface_operations&time=2021-02-18T12:44:05.006-08:00&rate=0
Spin the rover around in 3D- https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/spacecraft/rover/

Here is the video about why we should explore space even with problems here on Earth- https://youtu.be/lARpY0nIQx0

localize.description:
这将比超级碗更酷。感谢比尔和梅琳达-盖茨与我合作拍摄这个视频。阅读2021年年度信件，请点击：http://gatesnot.es/3cfnMF6。

观看直播- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gm0b_ijaYMQ&ab_channel=NASA
漫游车主登陆页-https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/
酷炫的漫游车互动动画《7分钟的恐怖》- https://eyes.nasa.gov/apps/mars2020/#/home?id=surface_operations&time=2021-02-18T12:44:05.006-08:00&rate=0
在3D中旋转漫游车- https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/spacecraft/rover/

这里是关于为什么我们应该探索空间的视频，即使在地球上有问题- https://youtu.be/lARpY0nIQx0。
localize.title: 火星探测器登陆碰撞课程--还剩3天!

localize.description:
這將比超級碗更酷。感謝比爾和梅琳達-蓋茨與我合作拍攝這個視頻。閱讀2021年年度信件，請點擊：http://gatesnot.es/3cfnMF6。

觀看直播- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gm0b_ijaYMQ&ab_channel=NASA
漫遊車主登陸頁-https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/
酷炫的漫遊車互動動畫《7分鐘的恐怖》- https://eyes.nasa.gov/apps/mars2020/#/home?id=surface_operations&time=2021-02-18T12:44:05.006-08:00&rate=0
在3D中旋轉漫遊車- https://mars.nasa.gov/mars2020/spacecraft/rover/

這裏是關於爲什麼我們應該探索空間的視頻，即使在地球上有問題- https://youtu.be/lARpY0nIQx0。
localize.title: 火星探測器登陸碰撞課程--還剩3天!
